Uses of Package
org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging

  • Packages that use org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.api.repl  
    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.listener  
    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging  
    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging.jms  
    org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging.json  
  • Classes in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging used by org.apache.hive.hcatalog.api.repl 
    Class and Description
    MessageFactory
    Abstract Factory for the construction of HCatalog message instances.
  • Classes in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging used by org.apache.hive.hcatalog.listener 
    Class and Description
    HCatEventMessage
    Class representing messages emitted when Metastore operations are done.
  • Classes in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging used by org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging 
    Class and Description
    AddPartitionMessage
    The HCat message sent when partition(s) are added to a table.
    AlterPartitionMessage
    HCat message sent when a table is Altered.
    AlterTableMessage
    HCat message sent when a table is Altered.
    CreateDatabaseMessage
    HCat message sent when a Database is created in HCatalog.
    CreateFunctionMessage
    HCat message sent when a Function is created in HCatalog.
    CreateTableMessage
    HCat message sent when a table is created in HCatalog.
    DropDatabaseMessage
    HCat message sent when a Database is dropped from HCatalog.
    DropFunctionMessage
    HCat message sent when a Function is dropped in HCatalog.
    DropPartitionMessage
    HCat message sent when a partition is dropped in HCatalog.
    DropTableMessage
    HCat message sent when a Table is dropped in HCatalog.
    HCatEventMessage
    Class representing messages emitted when Metastore operations are done.
    HCatEventMessage.EventType
    Enumeration of all supported types of Metastore operations.
    InsertMessage
    HCat message sent when an insert is done to a table or partition.
    MessageDeserializer
    Interface for converting HCat events from String-form back to HCatEventMessage instances.
    MessageFactory
    Abstract Factory for the construction of HCatalog message instances.
  • Classes in org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging used by org.apache.hive.hcatalog.messaging.jms 
    Class and Description
    HCatEventMessage
    Class representing messages emitted when Metastore operations are done.
